title: Refactor TaskManager - Split into smaller modules
description:
The task-manager.js file has grown too large (670+ lines) and is becoming difficult to work with, especially for AI agents. Need to split it into smaller, focused modules:

1. **TaskManager** (main class) - coordination and public API
2. **FileManager** - file I/O operations (load/save tasks, epics, etc.)
3. **ValidationManager** - data validation and schema checking
4. **ReleaseManager** - release generation and management
5. **MigrationManager** - data migration and backwards compatibility

Benefits:
- Easier to understand and maintain
- Better separation of concerns
- More testable code
- Easier for AI agents to work with smaller files
- Reduced cognitive load when making changes
author: default
